title: HYMOKEGE Queen Comforter
description:
About this item
Certified Safe Fabric: This queen comforter set is certified by OEKO-TEX Standard 100, ensuring it meets high safety standards and is free from harmful substances; made from soft microfiber, the interior is filled with premium 240 GSM microfiber, providing a cloud-like sleeping experience suitable for all seasons
Anti-Wrinkle Textured Design: Unlike traditional, plain duvet covers, our slightly pleated seersucker texture is both beautiful and delicate; creates a vivid three-dimensional wavy pattern; the striped texture enhances this design, which is wrinkle-resistant and easy to care for; the gentle seersucker queen bedding set adds a unique sense of romance and elegance to your room
Deep Pocket Fitted Sheet: Our stretchy deep-pocket fitted sheet easily fits any 12-15 inch mattress and stays in place no matter how you toss and turn; the soft brushed microfiber fabric provides just the right amount of warmth and comfort
What's Included: The queen size bed set includes 1 Comforter (88" x 88"), 2 Pillowcases (20" x 30"), 2 Pillow Shams (20" x 26" + 2"), 1 Fitted Sheet (60" x 80" + 14"), and 1 Flat Sheet (90" x 102"); the set is packed in a vacuum bag; simply dry on low heat or gently fluff under the sun to restore its loft
Easy Care: Our bed in a bag set is easy to care for; simply machine wash in cold water; if you have any questions or concerns, our customer service team is here to help
